text: Asked this in <#C680MM7D4|random> but realised there's a dedicated channel! Does anyone know of a way to get daily temperature data for the UK for recent months? I've found a Met Office source for 1960-2019, but nothing more recent

elements.text: but realised there's a dedicated channel! Does anyone know of a way to get daily temperature data for the UK for recent months? I've found a Met Office source for 1960-2019, but nothing more recent

text: Best thing would be to look for observational data I think. For example take a look at this dataset <https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/hadobs/hadcet/data/download.html>

elements.text: Best thing would be to look for observational data I think. For example take a look at this dataset

text: If you are looking for surface temperature here are the datasets. <https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/hadobs/> I think you probably looked at gridded data and that one has not been updated

attachments.title: Met Office Hadley Centre observations datasets
attachments.text: gridded datasets of meteorological variables for use in climate monitoring and climate modelling
attachments.fallback: Met Office Hadley Centre observations datasets

elements.text: If you are looking for surface temperature here are the datasets.
I think you probably looked at gridded data and that one has not been updated
